Phaeton is a domain specific language for machine learning tensor expressions with performance portability at different hardware platforms.

Phaeton: A tiny DSL for DNN accelerator tensor expressions

Phaeton Introduction

Introduction

Phaeton is a domain specific language for DNN accelerators.

Target platforms:

  • Cambricon MLUs
  • Huawei DaVinci Ascend Accelerators
  • Google TPUs
